name: Quick Math Castle Park
description:
Quick Math Castle Park

What's it about

Delve into the kingdom of math. Join Maisy in her quest to restore order to the kingdom.

Designed to stimulate the mind  and be completed as mental arithmetic, no calculator, no pen and paper required.

Delve into Quick Math Castle Park and prove you are a awesum!

The Quick Math Castle Park has been plagued by enchanted weeds and golems causing havoc and putting people in dire situations. Even the King has had his Crown stolen...

Goals to Complete the Game

Complete various quick math challenges to see how fast you can gather the gold you need to buy the equipment from the Castle Park tool shed.

Equipment for what you may ask?

To clamber down into the Castle Well and defeat the Rock Golem King...

The Score Board for chapter one is:

45mins or less (RPG Math Master)

1hour and 30 mins or less (Maths Great)

2 hours or less (Mediocre Math knight)

2-3 hours (Math Squire)

3 Hours or more (Maths Knave)

This game was inspired by the https://itch.io/jam/rpg-maker-jam-2020
